content.rendered:
We wish you a happy holiday season and a great 2021 from everyone at Falanx Cyber.

Our Christmas Office and Support Hours

Over the holiday period support for customers with 24/7 services will continue as usual. Back office services will be offline over public holidays. Anyone requiring emergency cyber incident response should contact 020 3997 8647.

Merry Phishmas!

Take our short Merry Phishmas Quiz to see just how many tricks you would spot.

Donation to Mind

It’s the season of goodwill and this festive season we have made a donation to Mind who provide advice and support to empower anyone experiencing a mental health problem.

Prepare for 2021

Find out what’s next for cyber security and the key challenges to overcome in 2021 with our free infographic.

excerpt.rendered: We wish you a happy holiday season and a great 2021 from everyone at Falanx…
